text: Berberis laidivo is a species of plant in the family Berberidaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high- altitude grassland.Tropicos Berberis laidivo L.A. Camargo Jørgensen, P. M. & S. León-Yánez. (eds.) 1999. Cat. Vasc. Pl. Ecuador. Monographs in systematic botany from the Missouri Botanical Garden 75: i–viii, 1–1181 The species is listed as "Data deficient".Ulloa Ulloa, C. & Pitman, N. 2003. Berberis laidivo. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
